sentences.english: While the White Swan comes easily to Nina, the dark mysteries of the Black Swan evade her.
sentences.chinese: 当白天鹅靠近妮娜的时候，黑天鹅的隐秘躲在暗处。

sentences.english: SECRET】He kept some money in a secret place.
sentences.chinese: 他将一些钱存放在一个隐秘的地方。

sentences.english: There is no secret technology on Internet.
sentences.chinese: 在互联网上没有任何隐秘的技术。

sentences.english: Break into Riddler's secret hideout and exact your revenge.
sentences.chinese: 闯入谜语人的隐秘藏身所，实现你的复仇。

sentences.english: The exit of the tunnel is concealed.
sentences.chinese: 地道的出口开在隐秘的地方。

sentences.english: He used a black hat to pass secret messages.
sentences.chinese: 他用一顶黑帽子来传递隐秘的信息。

sentences.english: It is to your inner hidden deep within the road?
sentences.chinese: 那就是直抵你内心隐秘深处的路途么？

sentences.english: We will prevent them from escaping to an off-planet hideaway.
sentences.chinese: 我们会阻止他们以隐秘的方式逃脱星球。

sentences.english: Itas a secret during you and me.
I tried to keep everything hush-hush .
sentences.chinese: 我努力让这一切保持隐秘。

sentences.english: As the secret love of which no one knows.
sentences.chinese: 就像隐秘的爱情，无人知晓。

sentences.english: The heart of a maiden is a dark forest.
Ding Zong also discovered deep-sea of the Kingdom of Wei is secret, inflict pressure.
sentences.chinese: 丁总也发现了魏海洋的隐秘，施以压力。

sentences.english: He is very much a private man and confides in no one.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很隐秘的人，从不向人吐露他的秘密。

sentences.english: Shopping has become a cloak-and-dagger affair.
sentences.chinese: 购物已变成了一种隐秘的事情。

sentences.english: Hide it in a hiding place where no one ever goes.
sentences.chinese: 把它藏在没有人的隐秘处。

definition: to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
to cover up/to conceal/to go into hiding
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
